description.value:
Frequency once per round

There is a part of your mind in another reality always processing your situation. You can @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.1OagaWtBpVXExToo]{Recall Knowledge} with any skill you are trained in. Decrease your @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned} value by 2 or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed} value by 1. If you lost an action this turn due to the stunned or slowed condition, you can use Restorative Recollection as a free action.
